text: A carriage is a type of vehicle that was used before cars were invented. It is a fancy type of cart or wagon, usually with four wheels and suspension. The carriages may be pulled by horses.Royal Household (UK), "Carriages" ; retrieved 2012-7-2. Carriages are often used for weddings. ==Related pages== * British state carriages * Japan state carriages ==References== category:Animal-powered vehicles
title: Carriage
